channel.title: Region 8 Drinking Water Online
channel.description: Updated Region 8 Drinking Water Online content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: PWS Seasonal Operational Change Form
item.description:
This form should be completed and submitted to EPA Region 8 when a Public Water System is making permanent changes to the season they are serving water to the public. The form is also available in MS Word format.

  • PWS Seasonal Operational Change Form (PDF)(1 pg, 87 K, 1/23/2017)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: RTCR and GWR Sample Labeling Instructions
item.description:
These instructions are specific to the Revised Total Coliform Rule (RTCR) and the Ground Water Rule triggered monitoring (TG GWR) samples collected in Wyoming and on Tribal Lands in EPA Region 8. They do not pertain to samples collected for Nitrates, Chemicals, Lead, Copper or any other contaminants. ONLY RTCR and TG GWR.

  • RTCR GWR Sample Labeling Instructions (PDF)(2 pp, 287 K, 12/29/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Revised Total Coliform Rule Lab Sampling Form
item.description:
Revised Total Coliform Rule Lab Sampling Form - This form should be completed when a water system collects any required Revised Total Coliform Rule (RTCR) samples. It should also be used when collecting “Special” non-compliance samples for the RTCR. Please submit this form to your lab along with their chain of custody to record where and when samples were collected and for what purpose. This template is also available in MS Word format.

  • Revised Total Coliform Rule Lab Sampling Form (PDF)(1 pg, 162 K, 1/18/2017)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Climate Ready Water Utilities Presentation
item.description:
EPA’s Climate Resilience Evaluation & Awareness Tool presentation: Supporting Utilities Adapting to the Impacts of Climate Change.

  • Climate Ready Water Utilities Presentation (PDF)(26 pp, 1 MB, 10/31/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Lead and Copper Rule Tier Schedule
item.description:
This document may be used by public water systems in Wyoming and on EPA R8 Tribal Lands as a guide to properly identify their lead and copper tap sample sites to comply with the Lead and Copper Rule.

  • Lead and Copper Rule Tier Schedule (PDF)(2 pp, 66 K, 9/27/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Revised Total Coliform Rule Implementation Challenges
item.description:
Revised Total Coliform Rule (RTCR) Implementation Challenges presentation given by Jamie Harris at the WARWS Fall Conference held in Cheyenne, Wyoming in September of 2016.

  • RTCR Implementation Challenges (PDF)(57 pp, 2 MB, 9/22/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Tribal PWS Basic Information Form
item.description:
This form should be completed and submitted to EPA Region 8 when a Tribal water system may be serving water to the public as a brand new entity or a new purchased entity.

  • Tribal PWS Basic Information Form (PDF)(3 pp, 33 K, 9/21/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Wyoming PWS Basic Information Form
item.description:
This form should be completed and submitted to EPA Region 8 when a Wyoming water system may be serving water to the public as a brand new entity or a new purchased entity.

  • Wyoming PWS Basic Information Form (PDF)(3 pp, 33 K, 9/21/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber

item.title: Wyoming Annual Compliance Report for Calendar Year 2015
item.description:
Annual 2015 report on National Primary Drinking Water Regulations (NPDWR) violations in Wyoming.

  • Wyoming Annual Compliance Report for Calendar Year 2015 (PDF)(20 pp, 139 K, 8/24/2016)
item.dc:creator: cweinber
